body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky
To His Excellency Berriah Magoffin
Govenor of Ky.
Sir,

We the undersigned ^know^ the petitioner Mr Ed Johnson do most respectfully petition your Excellency, to grant him a remittance a remittance of a fine assessed against his son, -- for whom he was security, -- in the Louisville city court. We state that Mr Johnson ins a cripple and is absolutely in need of his limited means to obtain a living for himself and family, and that he is now unable to pay the fine.

I can state that the petitioner has already payid some forty nine dollars, and 10 -- /100 costs in the ^above^ case, and that his atty is a former petition, erred in stating his fines were some One Hundred and seventy five dollars, instead of seventy five.

Henry Stickrod
John Bell
W B Murphy
Wm S Murphy
J A B Churchill
Wm Kimble
Joseph Miller
Pat Hawes Atty
Jno Doup
W H Robinson
A Gilmore
Ryange
J. W. Bryan
H. A. Olmstead
C. Olmstead
See will hand me the other petition --
B. M.
